word: LEFT FOR HOME MAY 2; NEARING SAN JOSE SAW EFFECTS OF EARTHQUAKE; STOPPED OFF AT MT. VIEW AND REMAINED OVER SABBATH TO COUNSEL WITH PACIFIC PRESS BOARD.  DISTRESSED TO SEE FALLEN WALLS OF PUBLISHING HOUSE, BUT THANKFUL NO WORKERS WERE KILLED.  WAS SPECIALLY STRENGTHENED TO SPEAK ON SABBATH.  EN ROUTE HOME SPENT SOME TIME DRIVING THROUGH SAN FRANCISCO AND VIEWING THE RUINS LEFT BY THE EARTHQUAKE.  OUR CHURCH STILL STANDING.  AT HOME MOST OF THE TIME FROM EARLY MAY TILL END OF YEAR.
